response.overview: Live in Yellowstone is a live album by the San Diego-based rock band Unwritten Law, originally released in 2003. It was recorded live for the MTV program Music in High Places by VH1 and features the band performing acoustic renditions of their songs in various natural settings in Yellowstone National Park (except for "Shallow," which was recorded acoustically in the studio).  Performance Includes: Rest Of My Life Before I Go How You Feel Geronimo Elva Blame It On Me Seein' Red
response.title: Unwritten Law - Live In Yellowstone
